mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mm_m_pub (id, pub_set_hash, provider_id, ext_id, int_id, version, stability, operator_id, begin_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{pubSet}, #{providerId}, #{extId}, #{intId}, #{version}, #{stability}, #{operatorId}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT id, pub_set_hash, provider_id, ext_id, int_id, version, stability, operator_id, begin_time FROM mm_m_pub WHERE pub_ext_id = #{pubExtId} AND end_time IS NULL
SELECT COUNT(mpub.id) FROM mm_m_pub mpub WHERE mpub.pub_set_hash = #{pubSet} AND mpub.end_time IS NULL
SELECT DISTINCT(provider_id) FROM mm_m_pub WHERE provider_id LIKE #{query_pattern} ORDER BY provider_id ASC

SELECT mpub.pub_set_hash, mpub.provider_id, mpub.ext_id, mpub.version, mpub.pub, mpub.operator_id, mpub.begin_time FROM mm_m_pub mpub, mm_m_ext mext WHERE mpub.ext_id = mext.id AND mext.`group` LIKE #{query_pattern} AND mpub.end_time IS NULL GROUP BY ext_id
